camera_interface.camera module¶

class camera_interface.camera.MachineVisionCamera¶

Bases: object

Class to interact with the HikRobot’s MVS camera: the CE series and CS series Area scan cameras

set_ui(ui)¶
xFunc(event) → None¶

Bind the drop-down list to the device information index

set_device_information_index(camera_name)¶
decoding_char(c_ubyte_value) → str¶
enum_devices(combobox: QComboBox | None = None) → list | int¶

List all the camera devices connected to the host

Parameters:

combobox (QtWidgets.QComboBox) – the combobox variable to display the list of devices

Returns:

  • devList (List) – list of all devices connected to host,

  • error_code (int) – returns the error code

open_device(combobox: QComboBox | None = None) → int¶

Opens the camera, that is establish the connection with the camera. But does not caputers of does any operation, it is just to establish the connection between the host and camera

Parameters:

combobox (QtWidgets.QComboBox) – the combobox variable to display the list of devices

Returns:

error_code – the error codes occured when there is any fault in opening the device

Return type:

int

start_grabbing(widgetDisplay: QLabel) → None¶

Begins to grab image from the camera, notice the trigger set on the camera as it contains: continuous, hardware trigger and software trigger modes

stop_grabbing() → None¶

stops the image capture even if there are triggers to the camera

close_device(*args)¶

Closes the camera and disables the connection between host and camera

Parameters:

*args (Any) – kept for event receiving while exiting the whole program

set_continue_mode()¶
set_software_trigger_mode()¶
